feat.description: it used to describe that a functionality or a entity is added in the project.

fix.description: It used for notice the fixing of a bug.

chore.description: Itt use for notice the changes made in the configuration of the project. Example: application.properties.

docs.description: It used to describe the changes effectuated in the documentation of a project. It can be in a javadoc, README...

test.description: it used for notice a change about testing.

refactor.description: It used when we make a refactor, it means that, we change the structure or the functioning of a entity or class of the project

revert.description: Reverting a change, come back to the last change.

style.description: It used to describe ha change of the type of response of a functionality, for example, in a api it changed the type of response.

frontend-style.description: It used to describe ha change of the type of response of a functionality, for example, in a api it changed the type of response.

perf.description: This key indicate the improves of a functionality, can be a reduction of time-execution, algorithm optimization, etc.

api-controller.description: represents that, will make changes in backend controllers.

api-classes.description: Represents that will make changes in a class of the backend

frontend.description: The changes will be made in frontend files, Example: Typescript files, html files, etc.
